reviews.text: SeaLink Whitsundays (owner)4 months agoHello Andrew,Your words are truly heart warming and your photos are breath-taking! It's wonderful to know that our staff made a significant contribution to your trip. We take pride in having a flexible and caring team that goes the extra mile to enhance our guests' experiences, whether it's by adjusting the route for a unique encounter with nature or ensuring each passenger's comfort and enjoyment.Your glowing recommendation is sincerely appreciated. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you aboard again soon. Safe travels!
reviews.author: Customer

reviews.text: SeaLink Whitsundays (owner)a month agoHello Aitor,Thank you for your review. This photo is absolutely stunning!You definitely had one of those perfect Whitsundays days with low wind and bright sunshine!We‚Äôre thrilled to hear you enjoyed the courtesy bus transfer, the spacious and air-conditioned vessel, the food onboard, and especially our friendly crew.Hill Inlet Lookout followed by almost three hours at Whitehaven‚Ä¶ it truly sounds like you lived the dream day out there!Thank you again for your recommendation, we appreciate it so much and hope to welcome you back on board soon!Have a lovely day.Kind regards,The SeaLink Team.
reviews.author: Customer

reviews.text: SeaLink Whitsundays (owner)4 months agoThanks so much, Martin! üêãüê¢We‚Äôre thrilled you enjoyed your Whitehaven Beach day with us and wow, your Hill Inlet photos are stunning!It is such a treat to share the day with whales, turtles, and those incredible views. We‚Äôre so glad the crew and the food made the experience even more special.On behalf of the SeaLink family, we wish you safe travels and hope to welcome you back on board soon.

reviews.text: SeaLink Whitsundays (owner)a day agoHello Carly,Happy New Year, and best wishes!Thank you very much for taking the time to leave such a kind review. It‚Äôs great to hear you enjoyed the tour and had a good laugh with the captain, he‚Äôll be glad to know his announcements went down well!The beach really does speak for itself, and we‚Äôre glad you had enough time to explore both the viewpoints and the beach.Thanks again for joining us, and we look forward to having you back on board one of our tours again.Kind regards,The SeaLink Whitsundays Team.
reviews.author: Customer

reviews.text: Hi Krzysztof,Thank you so much for your beautiful words and for sharing your experience and photos with us. We‚Äôre truly honoured to have been part of such a special day for your family. Mirko and our crew will be overjoyed to know their efforts helped make the Whitsundays fully accessible and allowed your son to share in those breathtaking views.Our team prides itself on going the extra mile, and hearing that you felt the passion and care we put into every tour means the world to us. We hope the memories from July stay with you forever, and we‚Äôd be delighted to welcome you all back to create even more.Your feedback is more than just a compliment, it's an inspiration for all tourism companies to strive for.From all of us at SeaLink Whitsundays, thank you for trusting us with your adventure.
reviews.author: Customer

reviews.text: SeaLink Whitsundays (owner)Edited 6 months agoThank you so much, J L, for your amazing review, six stars, wow! üåü We're thrilled to hear you had such a wonderful day cruising the Whitsundays with us. Our crew will be over the moon to know you felt so well looked after, and we're especially glad our catering team nailed the vegan options for you!Sounds like you got the full Whitsundays experience ‚Äì sunshine, a sprinkle of rain, stunning views, and even some bonus marine life sightings (whales, dolphins, turtles and stingrays ‚Äì what a day!). üêãüê¨üê¢Thank you again for joining us and taking the time to share your experience. We hope to welcome you back onboard again soon for another unforgettable adventure! üíô
